section.section: A complainant may be represented during the complaint process by any person the complainant chooses.
Either party may be represented at a hearing by counsel.
If a complainant fails to appeal a decision in accordance with this subtitle, the complainant is considered to have accepted the decision.
A failure to decide a complaint in accordance with this subtitle is considered a denial from which an appeal may be made.

text.section: Each party shall make every effort to resolve a complaint at the lowest level possible.
